    def switch_to_target_tracks(self, app, cmd, target_track, pos):
        dict1 = {
            "remote": {
                "next": get_position(585, 1848, 765, 2028),
                "rewind": get_position(315, 1848, 495, 2028),
                "prev": get_position(315, 1848, 495, 2028),
            },
            "qobuz": {
                "next": (AppiumBy.ID, "com.qobuz.music:id/skipNextBtn"),
                "rewind": (AppiumBy.ID, "com.qobuz.music:id/skipPreviousBtn"),
                "prev": (AppiumBy.ID, "com.qobuz.music:id/skipPreviousBtn")
            }
        }
    
        # Get key
        key = dict1[app][cmd]
        has_rewind = len(dict1[app]) == 3
    
        # Get track number
        runtime = self.extract_text()
        current_track = last_track = ""
        if len(target_track) == 2:
            # match = re.search(r"(\d{2})/", current_runtime[-1])
            match = re.search(r"^(\d{2})\.", runtime[pos])
            current_track = match.group(1)
            print(f"init_track: {current_track}")
        else:
            current_track = runtime[pos]
    
        # Switch track and record
        # result_list = current_track
        result_list = [runtime[pos]]
        # while current_track != target_track and current_track != last_track:
        while current_track != target_track:
            # Launch the app
            self.activate_app(app)
            # Wait for the app to sync
            time.sleep(2.0)
            # Press the button
            if app == "remote":
                self.press_the_remote_key(key, 1, 0)
                # Press twice if prev button has rewind function
                if cmd == "prev" and has_rewind:
                    self.press_the_remote_key(key, 1, 0)
            else:
                self.tap(key)
                # Press twice if prev button has rewind function
                if cmd == "prev" and has_rewind:
                    self.tap(key)
            # Wait
            time.sleep(20)
            # Update data
            last_track = current_track
